PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-10032012-07-26,  DFAIT,  ,  ,  , 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectAmendments of the Articles of Agreement of the International Monetary Fund
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs to take the actions necessary to bring into force for Canada the AMENDMENT OF THE ARTICLES OF AGREEMENT OF THE INTERNATIONAL MONETARY FUND ON THE REFORM OF THE EXECUTIVE BOARD in order to improve the International Monetary Fund's (IMF's) effectiveness and legitimacy by facilitating an increase in the overall representation and voice of emerging markets and developing countries in the IMF's governance structure.
AttachmentsAttachment
